targetString: Namoonni, gochawwan duudhaadhaan ala ta’an erga yaadatanii yookaan yaadanii booda, harka isaanii warra kaan caalaa irra deddeebi’anii dhiqachuu fi meeshaalee harka dhiqannaatiif caalaatti gatii kennuu malu.
en-mt: People, after remembering or thinking about non-traditional practices, may wash their hands more frequently than others and value hand sanitizers more.

sourceString: Furthermore, those who are allowed to wash their hands after such a contemplation are less likely to engage in other "cleansing" compensatory actions, such as volunteering.
targetString: Dabalataan, warreen hordoffii akkasii booda harka isaanii akka dhiqatan hayyamameef gochoota qulqullina kanneen akka tola ooltummaa keessatti hedduu hin hirmaatan.
en-mt: Additionally, those who are allowed to wash their hands after such monitoring are less likely to participate in hygiene practices such as volunteering.

sourceString: Religions prescribe hand washing for both hygienic and symbolic purposes.Symbolic hand washing, using water but no soap to wash hands, is a part of ritual hand washing featured in many religions, including Bahá'í Faith, Hinduism, tevilah and netilat yadayim in Judaism, Lavabo in Christianity, and Wudhu in Islam.Religions also prescribe hygienic hand washing, especially after certain actions.
targetString: Adeemsi harka dhiqannaa amantiin ajajamu qulqullinaafis fakkeenyummafis fayyada. Harka saamunaa malee dhiqachuun amantiiwwan hedduu kanneen akka Bahaa’ii Feeyiz, Hinduu’izim, Teevilaa fi Netilat yadayim Judiizim, Kiristaana keessatti Lavabo, fi Islaama keessatti Wudhu, beekamaadha. Amantiileenis harka akka dhiqannu, keessattu erga waan tokko hojjannen booda harka keenya akka dhiqannu ajaju.
en-mt: The religiously prescribed hand washing process is useful for both hygiene and symbolism. Washing hands without soap is common in many religions such as Baha'i Faith, Hinduism, Tevila and Netilat yadayim Judaism, Lavabo in Christianity, and Wudhu in Islam. Religions also command us to wash our hands, especially after doing something.

sourceString: Hinduism, Judaism and Islam mandate washing of hands after using the toilet.
targetString: Hinduyiizimii, Juudaayizimii fi Islaamummaa keessatti mana fincaanii dhaquun booda harka dhiqachuun dirqama.
en-mt: In Hinduism, Judaism and Islam, hand washing is mandatory after going to the bathroom.

sourceString: And, Hinduism, Buddhism, Sikhism, Judaism and Islam mandate washing of hands before and after every meal.
targetString: Hinduuyiizimii, Budiizimii, Siikiizimii, Juudaayizimii fi Islaamummaa keessatti nyaata duraa fi booda harka dhiqachuun dirqama.
en-mt: In Hinduism, Buddhism, Sikhism, Judaism and Islam, hand washing is mandatory before and after meals.

sourceString: Workplace hazard controls for COVID-19
targetString: Too'annoo balaa iddoo hojii COVID-19 dhaaf
en-mt: Workplace risk management for COVID-1

sourceString: Workplace hazard controls for COVID-19 are the application of occupational safety and health methodologies for hazard controls to the prevention of coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19).
targetString: COVID-19’f too'annaan balaa bakka hojii hojiirra oolmaa nageenyummaa hojii fi mala hojii fayyaa too'annoo balaaf ittisa dhibee vaayirasii koroonaatiifi 2019(COVID-19).
en-mt: Workplace risk management for COVID-19 implementation of occupational safety and health practices for risk management and prevention of the coronavirus and 2019(COVID-19).

sourceString: The proper hazard controls in the workplace depend on the worksite and job task, based on a risk assessment of sources of exposure, disease severity in the community, and risk factors of individual workers who may be vulnerable to contracting COVID-19.
targetString: Iddoo hojii keessatti to’annoowwan balaa warri sirriin iddoo hojiifi hojii irratti hundaa’u, tilmaammii balaa maddoota saaxila ba’uu, hawaasicha keessatti hammeenya dhukkubaa, akkasumas haal-dureewwan balaa hojjeettoota dhuunfaa kanneen COVID-19’n hubamuuf saaxila ba’uu malan irratti hundaa’uun.
en-mt: Appropriate risk controls in the workplace are based on the workplace and workplace, risk estimates of sources of exposure, the severity of the disease in the community, and the risk factors of individual workers who may be exposed to COVID-1 establishing the.

sourceString: According to the U.S. Occupational Safety and Health Administration (OSHA), lower exposure risk jobs have minimal occupational contact with the public and other coworkers, for which basic infection prevention measures are recommended, including hand washing, encouraging workers to stay home if they are sick, respiratory etiquette, and maintaining routine cleaning and disinfecting of the work environment.
targetString: Akka Bulchiinsa Fayyaa fi Nagenyummaa Hojii U.S. tti (Occupational Safety and Health Administration) (OSHA), hojiiwwan balaa saaxila ba’uu gadi aanaa uummataafi waa’ilaa wajjin qunnamtii hojii xiqqaa qabu, kan tooftaan ittisa dhukkubaan hubamuu bu’uuraa isaaniif gorfamu, harka dhiqachuu, hojjettoonni yoo isaan dhukkube akka isaan mana oolan jajjabeessuu, qulqullina hargansuu, akkasumas yeroo yeroon qulqullina eeguu fi naannoo hojii irraa baakteeriyaa qulleessuu dabalatee.
en-mt: According to the US Occupational Safety and Health Administration (OSHA), hand washing is recommended for low-risk jobs with minimal work contact with the public and wives, for which basic infection prevention strategies are recommended , including encouraging employees to stay home if they are sick, respiratory hygiene, as well as regular sanitation and cleaning of bacteria from the work area.

sourceString: Medium exposure risk jobs include those that require frequent or close contact with people who are not known or suspected with COVID-19, but may be infected due to ongoing community transmission or international travel.
targetString: Hojiiwwan balaa saaxila ba’uu giddugaleessaa kan hammatan sanneen namoota COVID-19'n qabamuun isaanii hin beekamne yookaan hin shakkamne waliin irradeddeebiin yookaan dhiheenyaan walqunnamtii barbaadanidha, garuu tatamsa'ina hawaasa keessa adeemuutiin yookaan imala addunyaawaan hubamuu malu.
en-mt: Those activities that involve moderate exposure risk require frequent or close contact with people who are not known or suspected of being infected with COVID-19, but may be affected by community spread or global travel.

sourceString: This includes workers who have contact with the general public such as in schools, high-population-density work environments, and some high-volume retail settings.
targetString: Kun kan dabalatu hojjettoota kanneen uummata waliin kan akka manneen barnootaa, naannoowwan hojii uummata ol’aanaa qaban, akkasumas qindaa’inoota qeenxabaa qabiyyee ol’aanaa waliin qunnamtii qaban.
en-mt: This includes employees who have contact with the public such as schools, highly populated work areas, as well as high-content cluster settings.

sourceString: Hazard controls for this group, in addition to basic infection prevention measures, include ventilation using high-efficiency air filters, sneeze guards, and having personal protective equipment available in case a person with COVID-19 is encountered.
targetString: Garee kanaaf to’annoowwan balaa, maloota ittisa dhukkubaan hubamuu bu’uuraa dabalatee, kan hammatu dhimbiibdota qilleensaa ga’umsa olaanaa fayyadamuun qilleensa haaraa galchuu, isniiz gaardii, akkasumas yoo namni COVID-19 waliinii argameef meeshaa ittisaa dhuunfaa jiru qabaachuudha.
en-mt: Risk controls for the team, including basic infection prevention methods, include ventilation using high-efficiency air compressors, sneeze guards, and having personal protective equipment in place if a person with COVID-19 is found.

sourceString: OSHA considers healthcare and mortuary workers exposed to known or suspected person with COVID-19 to be at high exposure risk, which increases to very high exposure risk if workers perform aerosol-generating procedures on, or collect or handle specimens from, known or suspected person with COVID-19.
targetString: OSHA'n hojjettoota kunuunsa fayyaa fi mana reeffaa namoota COVID-19'n qabaman yookaan shakkamaniif saaxila ba’an balaa cimaaf saaxilamoota jedhee fudhata, kan yoo hojjettonni adeemsota bulbula qilleensaa maddisiisuu hojjechuu, yookaan yeroo eddattoowwan namoota COVID-19'n qabamanii yookaan shakkamanii sassaaban balaa ol’aanaaf saaxilamuu dabalu.
en-mt: OSHA considers health care and mortuary workers exposed to people infected or suspected of having COVID-19 to be at serious risk, such as if workers operate air vent generating processes, or when collecting samples of people infected or suspected of having COVID-1 increase exposure to high risk.

sourceString: Hazard controls appropriate for these workers include engineering controls such as negative pressure ventilation rooms, and personal protective equipment appropriate to the job task.
targetString: To’annoowwan balaa sirriin hojjettoota kunniiniif kan hammatan to’annoowwan injinariingii kan akka kutaawwan qillensa afarsan dhiibbaa alta’aa, akkasumas meeshaa of-eeggannoo dhuunfaa hojiichaaf sirrii ta’edha.
en-mt: Proper hazard controls for these workers include engineering controls such as high pressure ventilation chambers, as well as personal protective equipment appropriate for the job.

sourceString: COVID-19 outbreaks can have several effects within the workplace.
targetString: Weerarri COVID-19 bakkee hojiitti dhiibbaawwan hedduu qabaachuu danda’a.
en-mt: The COVID-19 outbreak can have many impacts in the workplace.

sourceString: Workers may be absent from work due to becoming sick, needing to care for others, or from fear of possible exposure.
targetString: Hojjettoonni sababa dhukkubsataniif, namoota biroo kunuunsuu waan barbaadaniif, yookaan saaxila ba’uu uumamuu danda’u sodaachuun hojiirraa hafuu malu.
en-mt: Employees may miss work because they are sick, need to take care of others, or fear exposure.

sourceString: Patterns of commerce may change, both in terms of what goods are demanded, and the means of acquiring these goods (such as shopping at off-peak hours or through delivery or drive-through services).
targetString: Akkinni daldalaa jijjiiramuu mala, mi’oonni maalii akka barbaadamaniifi karaa ittiin mi’oonni kun argaman lachuun (kan akka bittaa sa’aatiiwwan qabamoo hin taaneettiifi tajaajiloota konkolaataa keessa taa’anii bitachuu).
en-mt: The nature of the business may change, both in terms of what goods are needed and the ways in which these goods are obtained (such as shopping for off-the-shelf watches and in-car shopping for services).

sourceString: Lastly, shipments of items from geographic areas severely affected by COVID-19 may be interrupted.An infectious disease preparedness and response plan can be used to guide protective actions.
targetString: Dhumarratti, fe'insi meeshalee bakkeewwaan ji'oogiraafii COVID-19'n garmalee miidhaman irraa addaan cituu ni danda'a. Qophaa'ummaan dhukkuba daddarbaafi karoorri deebii gocha ittisaa qajeelchuuf fayyaduu danda’a.
en-mt: Finally, shipments of goods from geographies severely affected by COVID-19 may be interrupted. Infectious disease preparedness and response planning can help guide preventive action.

sourceString: Plans address the levels of risk associated with various worksites and job tasks, including sources of exposure, risk factors arising from home and community settings, and risk factors of individual workers such as old age or chronic medical conditions.
targetString: Karooronni sadarkaawwan balaa iddoowwan hojii hedduufi hojiiwwan wajjin walqabatan, maddoota saaxila ba’uu, haal-dureewwan balaa qindaa’inoota manaafi hawaasa irraa ka’an, akkasumas haal-dureewwan hojjettoota dhuunfaa kanneen akka dulloomuu yookaan haala wal’aansaa yeroo dheeraaf ture dabalatee irratti mari’atu.
en-mt: Plans discuss risk levels associated with multiple workplaces and occupations, including sources of exposure, risk factors arising from home and community settings, and individual worker conditions such as aging or long-standing medical conditions 'atu.

sourceString: They also outline controls necessary to address those risks, and contingency plans for situations that may arise as a result of outbreaks.
targetString: Isaan ammas balaawwan sanneen hambisuuf to’annoowwan barbaachisoo ta’an, akkasumas sababa jalqabbii dhukkubaatiif karoorota ta’uu yookaan dhiisuu malan adda baasu.
en-mt: They will also identify the controls needed to avoid those risks, as well as plans that may or may not be due to the onset of the disease.

sourceString: Infectious disease preparedness and response plans may be subject to national or subnational recommendations.
targetString: Qophaa’ummaan dhukkuboota daddarbanii fi sagantaawwan ittisaa yaada sadarkaa biyyaalessaa fi kutaa biyyaalessaa kennamuun fooyya’uu malu.
en-mt: Communicable disease preparedness and prevention programs may be improved with national and state level recommendations.

sourceString: Objectives for response to an outbreak include reducing transmission among staff, protecting people who are at higher risk for adverse health complications, maintaining business operations, and minimizing adverse effects on other entities in their supply chains.
targetString: Kaayyoowwan dhukkuba ka’e tokkoof deebii kennuu kanneen armaan gadii of keessatti qabata: tatamsa’ina dhukkubaa hojjettoota mana hojii tokkoo keessa jiru hir’isuu, namoota dhukkuboota biroo qaban, kanneen balaa hamaadhaaf saaxilamuu danda’an eeguu, sochiiwwan hojii itti fufsiisuu, fi walitti hidhata dhiyeessii keessa wantoota jiran biroo irratti miidhaa ga’u xiqqeessuu.
en-mt: The objectives of responding to an outbreak include: reducing the spread of illness among workers in a workplace, protecting people with other illnesses, who may be at risk, sustaining work activities, and together minimizing damage to other components in the supply chain.

sourceString: The disease severity in the community where the business is located affects the responses taken.
targetString: Hammeenyi dhibee hawaasa iddoo daldalli itti argamu keessa jiruu deebiiwwan fudhataman ni miidha.
en-mt: The severity of the disease in the community where the business is located affects the responses received.

sourceString: The hierarchy of hazard controls is a framework widely used in occupational safety and health to group hazard controls by effectiveness.
targetString: Gulantaan to’annoo balaa caasaa nageenyummaa hojii keessattiifi fayyaa keessatti to’annoo balaa bu’a qabeessummaan walitti qabuuf bal’inaan hojiirra oolu.
en-mt: Risk control levels are widely used to effectively integrate risk control in occupational safety and health structures.

sourceString: Where COVID-19 hazards cannot be eliminated, the most effective controls are engineering controls, followed by administrative controls, and lastly personal protective equipment.
targetString: Iddoowwan balaan COVID-19 dhabamsiifamuu hin dandeenyetti, to’annoowwan bu’aa qaban to’annoowwan injinariingiiti, to’annoowwan bulchiinsaan hordofamuun, fi dhumarratti meeshaa of-eeggannoo dhuunfaa.
en-mt: Where the risk of COVID-19 cannot be eliminated, effective controls are engineering controls, followed by administrative controls, and finally personal protective equipment.

sourceString: Engineering controls involve isolating employees from work-related hazards without relying on worker behavior, and can be the most cost-effective solution to implement.
targetString: too'annooleen Injinariingii hojjettoota balaa hojii waliin wal qabatan osoo amala hojjetaa irratti hin hundaa'in irraa gargar baasuu dabalatu, fi hojiirra oolmaadhaaf furmaata baay’ee baasii qusatu ta’uu danda’a.
en-mt: Engineering controls include separating workers from job-related hazards without depending on worker characteristics, and can be a very cost-effective solution for implementation.

sourceString: Administrative controls are changes in work policy or procedures that require action by the worker or employer.
targetString: To’annoowwan bulchiinsaa jijjiiramoota imaammata hojii keessaa yookaan adeemsota gochaa hojjetaa yookaan miindessaa barbaadani.
en-mt: Administrative controls require changes in work policy or employee or employer action processes.

sourceString: Personal protective equipment (PPE) is considered less effective than engineering and administrative controls, but can help prevent some exposures.
targetString: Meeshaan of-eeggannoo dhuunfaa (PPE) to’annoowwan injinariingii fi bulchiinsaa caalaa bu’a qabeessummaan isaa xiqqaa ta’ee ilaalama, garuu saaxila ba’insa muraasa ittisuuf gargaaruu danda’a.
en-mt: Personal protective equipment (PPE) is considered less effective than engineering and administrative controls, but can help prevent a few exposures.

sourceString: All types of PPE must be selected based upon the hazard to the worker, properly fitted as applicable (e.g., respirators), consistently and properly worn, regularly inspected, maintained, and replaced, as necessary, and properly removed, cleaned, and stored or disposed of to avoid contamination.
targetString: Gosoonni PPE hundi balaa isaan hojjetaa irraan gahan irratti hundaa’uun, akka hojiirra ooluu danda’utti kan gitu (fkn., meeshaawwan afaaniifi funyaaanitti godhamanii qilleensa baasan (respirators)), walifufiinsaafi sirriitti kan uffatame, yeroo mara kan sakattaa’amu, kan suphamu, fi kan bakka bu’u, akka barbaachisutti, fi sirriitti kan baafame, qulqullaa’e, akkasumas kuufame yookaan faalama hambisuuf kan gatame ta’uu qaba.
en-mt: All types of PPE are equivalent as applicable (e.g., respirators), continuously and properly worn, regularly inspected, and maintained, depending on the hazards they pose to the worker , and replaced, as required, and properly removed, cleaned, and stored or disposed of to avoid contamination.

sourceString: According to the U.S. Occupational Safety and Health Administration (OSHA), lower exposure risk jobs have minimal occupational contact with the public and other coworkers.
targetString: Akka Bulchiinsa Fayyaa fi Nagenyummaa Hojii (OSHA) U.S. tti, hojiiwwan balaa saaxila ba’uu gadi aanaa uummataafi waa’ilaa wajjin qunnamtii hojii xiqqaa qabu.
en-mt: According to the US Occupational Health and Safety Administration (OSHA), low-risk jobs have little work contact with the public and employees.

sourceString: Basic infection prevention measures recommended for all workplaces include frequent and thorough hand washing, encouraging workers to stay home if they are sick, respiratory etiquette including covering coughs and sneezes, providing tissues and trash receptacles, preparing for telecommuting or staggered shifts if needed, discouraging workers from using others' tools and equipment, and maintaining routine cleaning and disinfecting of the work environment.
targetString: Tarkaanfiin bu'uuraa faalama ittisuu iddoolee hojii hundumaaf kan gorfamu irra deddeebiinii fii gadi fageenyaan harka dhiqachuu, yoo dhukkubsatan akka mana turaniif hojjettoota jajjabeessuu, qaamota hargansuu qufaa fi haxxifannaa haguuguu dabalatee, waan ittiin funyaan qulleefatanii fi korojoo haraa itti gatan dhi'eessuu, yoo barbaadame telekoominikeeshiinii yookaan jijjiirra ajaa'ibsiisaa qopheessuu, hojjettootni meeshaalee garaagaraa akka hin fayyadamne dhorkuu, akkasumas yeroo yereootti qulqulleessuu fii naannoon hojii akka hin faalamne eeguu.
en-mt: Basic contamination prevention measures recommended for all workplaces include frequent and thorough hand washing, encouraging employees to stay home if sick, covering respiratory organs including coughing and sneezing, and providing lip sanitizer and fresh disposal, if required arrange telecommunications or surprise changes, prohibit employees from using various equipment, and keep the work environment clean and free of contamination.

sourceString: Prompt identification and isolation of potentially infectious individuals is a critical step in protecting workers, customers, visitors, and others at a worksite.
targetString: Adda baasuun battalaafi qofaatti baasuun namoota humna guddaan dhibee dabarsuu danda’anii hojjettoota, maamiloota, daawwattoota, akkasumas iddoo hojii kan biraa eeguu keessatti tarkaanfii murteessaadha.
en-mt: Immediate and exclusive identification and evacuation of potentially highly contagious persons is a crucial step in protecting employees, customers, visitors, and other workplaces.

sourceString: The U.S. Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC) recommends that employees who have symptoms of acute respiratory illness are to stay home until they are free of fever, signs of a fever, and any other symptoms for at least 24 hours without the use of fever-reducing or other symptom-altering medicines, and that sick leave policies are flexible, permit employees to stay home to care for a sick family member, and that employees are aware of these policies.
targetString: Wiirtuu To’annaa fi Ittisa Dhukkubaa U.S.(CDC) hojjeettoonni mallattoo dhibee hafuura kutaa hatattamaa hamma isaan gubaa qaamaa, mallattoowwan gubaa qaamaa, akkasumas mallattoolee kam irraayyuu qorichoota gubaa qaamaa hir’isan yookaan qorichoota kanneen biroo mallattoolee jijjiiran osoo hin fayyadamin yoo xinnaate sa’aatiiwwan 24’f hamma bilisa ta’anitti mana ooluu akka qaban eera, akkasumas imaammatoonni sababa dhukkubaatiin hayyama hojiirraa hafuu jijjiiramoodha, hojjettoonni mana oolanii miseensa maatii dhukkubsate akka kunuunsan ni hayyama, akkasumas hojjettoonni imaammatoota kunniin ni beeku.
en-mt: The US Centers for Disease Control and Prevention(CDC) recommends that emergency room staff with symptoms of respiratory illness until they have burns, burn symptoms, and any symptoms without using antipyretics or other symptom-altering medications for at least hours It mentions that 24s must stay home as long as they are exempt, and the sick leave policies are flexible, allowing employees to stay home to care for a sick family member, and employees are aware of these policies.

sourceString: According to OSHA, medium exposure risk jobs include those that require frequent or close contact within six feet (1.8 m) of people who are not known or suspected COVID-19 patients, but may be infected with SARS-CoV-2 due to ongoing community transmission around the business location, or because the individual has recent international travel to a location with widespread COVID-19 transmission.
targetString: Akka OSHA tti, hojiiwwan balaa saaxila ba’uu giddu-galeessaa ta'an warreen irra deddeebiin yookaan fageenya hanga 1.8m keessatti namoota hin beekamne yookaan dhukkuba COVID-19’n shakkaman, garuu akka tasaa daddarbiinsa hawaasaa yeroo ammaa bakkeewwan daladalaa naannootti ta'aa jiru irraan kan ka'e SARS-CoV-2'dhaan yookaan sababa namni kun yeroo dhiyootti biyya alaa bakka itti COVID-19 itti babal'atee jiru waan deemeef kan qabaman waliin walitti-dhiyaachuuf dirqisiisan of-kessatti qabata.
en-mt: According to OSHA, moderate exposure risk activities are those that frequently or within a distance of up to 1.8m of unknown persons or suspected cases of COVID-19, but accidental community transmission is currently in local businesses existing SARS-CoV-2 or because the person has recently traveled abroad where COVID-19 is prevalent and forces them to come into contact with infected persons.

sourceString: These include workers who have contact with the general public such as in schools, high-population-density work environments, and some high-volume retail settings.Engineering controls for this and higher risk groups include installing high-efficiency air filters, increasing ventilation rates, installing physical barriers such as clear plastic sneeze guards, and installing a drive-through window for customer service.Administrative controls for this and higher risk groups include encouraging sick workers to stay at home, replacing face-to-face meetings with virtual communications, establishing staggered shifts, discontinuing nonessential travel to locations with ongoing COVID-19 outbreaks, developing emergency communications plans including a forum for answering workers’ concerns, providing workers with up-to-date education and training on COVID-19 risk factors and protective behaviors, training workers who need to use protecting clothing and equipment how to use it, providing resources and a work environment that promotes personal hygiene, requiring regular hand washing, limiting customers' and the public's access to the worksite, and posting signage about hand washing and other COVID-19 protective measures.Depending on the work task, workers with at least medium exposure risk may need to wear personal protective equipment including some combination of gloves, a gown, a face shield or face mask, or goggles.
targetString: Kun hojjettoota uummata bal’aa waliin quunnamtii qaban, kanneen akka manneen barnootaa, bakkee hojii namni itti heddummaatu, bakka qinxaaboon bal’inaan itti adeemsifamu of keessatti qabata. Kanaafi gareewwan balaa guddaaf saaxilamaniif to’annoowwan injinarummaa qulqulleessituuwwan qilleensaa ga’umsa guddaa qaban dhaabuu, baay’ina qilleensa seensisuu guddisuu, danqaawwan mul’atan kanneen akka ittistoota haxxiffannaa kan pilaastikaa, foddaa konkolaataa keessa taa’anii tajaajila maamilummaa argatan dhaabuu of keessatti qabata. To’annoowwan bulchiinsaa kan gareewwan balaa guddaaf saaxilaman kanniinii wantoota akka hojjettoonni dhukkubsatoon akka mana turaniif jajjabeessuu, walga’ii fuulaafi fuulattii quunnamtii mosaajjiitiin bakka buusuu, hojii dabaree walirraa faffageessuun taasisuu, imalawwan murteessoo hintaane gara bakkeewwan COVID-19 itti babal’achaa jiruutti taasisuu dhiisuu, karoora quunnamtii yeroo hatattamaa qopheessuu, fooramii yaaddoo hojjettootaa ittiin deebisan dabalatee, hojjettootaaf barnootaafi leenjii ammayyaawaa wantoota COVID-19 tiif nama saaxilanii fi mala ittisaa irratti kennuufii, hojjettoota uffataa fi meeshaalee faalama ittisan uffachuu barbaadaniif leenjii akkaataa uffannaa kennuufii, meeshaaleefi haala hojii qulqullina dhuunfaa jajjabeessan, kanneen yeroodhaa yerootti harka dhiqachuu gaafatan mijeessuufii, maamiloonniifi uummati bakkee hojiitti akka hin heddummaanne gochuu, mallattoo harka dhiqannaa dhaabuu fi tarkaanfiiwwan biroo COVID-19 ittiin ittisan of keessatti qabata. Hojicharratti hundaa’uudhaanis, hojjettoonni balaa giddugaleessaatiif saaxilaman meeshaalee ittisaa kanneen akka gilaavii, gaawonii, golgituu fuulaa ykn maaskii fuulaa yookaan kishaafee hojii keessaa walitti fiduudhaan godhachuu qabu.
en-mt: This includes employees who have contact with the general public, such as schools, busy workplaces, and places where bullying is widespread. That's why engineering controls for high-risk groups include installing high-efficiency air purifiers, increasing the number of ventilation, installing visible barriers such as plastic sneeze barriers, sitting in the car windows to customer service. Administrative controls for these high-risk groups include encouraging sick employees to stay home, replacing face-to-face meetings with text messages, separating shifts, and avoiding non-critical trips to areas where COVID-19 is spreading , develop emergency communication plans, including forums to address employee concerns, provide employees with modern education and training on COVID-19 risk factors and preventive measures, provide dress code training for employees who wish to wear contamination-preventive clothing and equipment, and encourage personal hygiene equipment and working conditions , facilitating those who require periodic hand washing, keeping customers and the public out of the workplace, installing hand washing signs and other measures to prevent COVID-1 Depending on the job, workers at moderate risk should wear protective equipment such as gloves, gowns, face shields or face masks or work jackets.

sourceString: Workers in this risk group rarely require use of respirators.
targetString: Hojjettoonni garee balaa kana keessa jiran itti fayyadama hafuura baafachiistuu kan isaan barbaadan yeroo baay’ee muraasa.
en-mt: Employees in this hazard group rarely require the use of respirators.

sourceString: If a person becomes sick on an airplane, proper controls to protect workers and other passengers include separating the sick person from others by a distance of 6 feet, designating one crew member to serve the sick person, and offering a face mask to the sick person or asking the sick person to cover their mouth and nose with tissues when coughing or sneezing.
targetString: Yoo namni xiyyaara irratti dhibame, too'annaan sirrii hojjettootaa fi imaltoota biroo eeguuf godhamu kan of-keessatti qabatu nama dhibame kanneen biroo irraa fageenya faana 6’n fageessuu, miseensa garee imalaa keessaa dhukkubsataa akka tajaajiluuf nama tokko ramaduu, akkasumas golgaa fuulaa dhukkubsatichaaf dhiyeessuu yookaan yeroo qufa'u yookaan haxxiffatu afaanii fi funyaan isaa akka sooftiidhaan haguugu dhukkubsataa gaafachuu.
en-mt: If a person becomes ill on an airplane, proper controls to protect crew and other passengers include keeping the ill person 6 feet away from other passengers, assigning a member of the travel crew to serve the patient, and providing a mask for the patient or ask the patient to cover his mouth and lips with soap when coughing or sneezing.

sourceString: Cabin crew should wear disposable medical gloves when tending to a sick traveler or touching body fluids or potentially contaminated surfaces, and possibly additional personal protective equipment if the sick traveler has fever, persistent cough, or difficulty breathing.
targetString: Keessummeessitoonni xiyyaaraa yeroo imalaa dhukkubsataa irratti xiyyeeffatan yookaan dhangala’oota qaamaa tuqan yookaan qaamolee garmalee faalaman tuqan uffata wal’aansaa harkaa erga itti fayyadamamee booda gatamu uffachuu qabu, akkasumas yoo imalaan dhukkubsatu sun gubaa qaamaa, qufaa walirraa hin cinne akkasumas hafuura kutaa qabaaate meeshalee of-eeggannoo dhuunfaa dabalataa uffachuu qabu.
en-mt: Flight attendants who target patients during travel or touch body fluids or extremely contaminated organs should wear disposable medical gloves after use, and if the sick passenger has burns, persistent cough and room breathing, self- additional personal protective equipment should be worn.

sourceString: Gloves and other disposable items should be disposed of in a biohazard bag, and contaminated surfaces should be cleaned and disinfected afterwards.For commercial shipping, including cruise ships and other passenger vessels, hazard controls include postponing travel when sick, and self-isolating and informing the onboard medical center immediately if one develops a fever or other symptoms while on board.
targetString: Uffanni harkaa fi kanneen gatamuu danda'an kan biroon korojoo baayoohaazaardii keessatti gatamuu qabu, akkasumas sana booda waantonni faalaman qulqullaa'uu fi miidhaa kan hin geessisne ta'uu qabu. Fe’isa daldalaaf dooniiwwan cruise fi dooniiwwan imaltootaa biroo dabalatee, miidhaa too'achuun kan hammatu yeroo dhukkubi argamu imala yeroo biraaf dabarsuu, akkasumas yeroo imalarra jiranitti yoo tokko dhagna gubaa qabaate yookaan mallattoolee biraa agarsiise qofaatti of-baasuu fi wiirtuu fayyaa imalarra jirutti hatattamaan beeksisuudha.
en-mt: Handkerchiefs and other disposable items should be disposed of in biohazard bins, and the contaminated items should then be cleaned and harmless. For commercial cargo, including cruise ships and other passenger vessels, damage control includes postponing voyages when illness is detected, as well as evacuating only if one develops burns or other symptoms while on the voyage and immediately notify the traveling health center . . . .

sourceString: Ideally, medical follow-up should occur in the isolated person's cabin.For schools and childcare facilities, CDC recommends short-term closure to clean or disinfect if an infected person has been in a school building regardless of community spread.
targetString: Akka yaadaatti, hordoffiin wal'ansaa gola kophaatti gargar baafame keessatti raawwatamuu qaba ture. Bu'uuraalee manneen barnootaafi kunuunsa daa'immanii ilaalchisee, yoo namni faalame gamoo mana barnootaa keessa ture, yooma dhukkubichi hawaasa keessatti hin babal'anneyyuu, Wiirtuun too'annoo Dhukkubaa (CDC) farra baakteriyaa biifuufi qulqulleessuuf yeroo gabaabaadhaaf akka cufamaniif yaada kenna.
en-mt: Ideally, treatment monitoring should have taken place in secluded chambers. With regard to school infrastructure and child care, if an infected person has been in a school building, the Centers for Disease Control (CDC) recommends brief closures for antibiotic spraying and cleaning, even if the disease has not spread to the community.

sourceString: When there is minimal to moderate community transmission, social distancing strategies can be implemented such as canceling field trips, assemblies, and other large gatherings such as physical education or choir classes or meals in a cafeteria, increasing the space between desks, staggering arrival and dismissal times, limiting nonessential visitors, and using a separate health office location for children with flu-like symptoms.
targetString: Yeroo daddarbuun hawaasa xiqqaa irraa gara giddugalaatti tti jiraatu, tarsiimoowwan qaamaan walirraa fagaachuu kanneen akka deemsa bakkee haquu, yaa’iiwwan fi waliqabamoota gurguddoo kanneen akka barnoota jabina qaamaa yookaan barnoota faarfattootaa yookaan sooratawwan kaafteeriyaa keessaa, iddoo minjaalota gidduu dabaluu, gahiinsaafi yeroo bahumsaa addaa adda baasanii mijeessuu, daawwattoota barbaachisoo hin taane daangessuu, akkasumas wajjira hojii fayyaa adda ba’e ijoollee mallattoolee akka infiluweenzaa waliiniif fayyadamuun hojiirra ooluu danda’u.
en-mt: When transmission occurs from small to medium communities, physical distancing strategies such as canceling walks, large gatherings and gatherings such as fitness classes or choir classes or cafeteria meals, increasing table space, identifying specific arrivals and exit times facilitation, restricting unnecessary visitors, and using a separate medical practice office for children with symptoms such as influenza can be implemented.

sourceString: When there is substantial transmission in the local community, in addition to social distancing strategies, extended school dismissals may be considered.For law enforcement personnel performing daily routine activities, the immediate health risk is considered low by CDC.
targetString: Hawaasa naannoo keessatti tatamsa’inni baay’een yeroo jiraatu, wal irraa fageenya hawaasummaatti dabaluudhaan, yeroo dheeraadhaaf manneen barnootaa cufuun ilaalcha keessa galuu mala. Hojjettoota seera hojiitti hiikan, kanneen hojii guyyaa hunda hojjetamutti bobba’anii jiran, balaan fayyaa hatattamaa isaan quunnamu CDC dhaan gad aanaatti lakkaawamee jira.
en-mt: When there's a lot of spread in local communities, adding to social distancing, longer school closures may be considered. The immediate health risks of law enforcement workers, who are engaged in everyday activities, are rated low by the CDC.

sourceString: Law enforcement officials who must make contact with individuals confirmed or suspected to have COVID-19 are recommended to follow the same guidelines as emergency medical technicians, including proper personal protective equipment.
targetString: Qondaaltonni seera kabachiisan kanneen namoota COVID-19 qabaachuun isaanii mirkanaa’e yookaaan shakkame waliin dirqama walqunnamuu qaban qajeelfama walfakkaataa akka ogeessota wal’aansaa balaa tasaa hordofan gorfamu, meeshaawwan ittisaa dhuunfaa sirrii dabalatee.
en-mt: Law enforcement officials who are obliged to interact with people with confirmed or suspected COVID-19 are advised to follow the same guidelines as emergency medical professionals, including proper personal protective equipment.

sourceString: If close contact occurs during apprehension, workers should clean and disinfect their duty belt and gear prior to reuse using a household cleaning spray or wipe, and follow standard operating procedures for the containment and disposal of used PPE and for containing and laundering clothes.
targetString: Yeroo cinqiitti yoo qunnamtiin dhiyoo uumame, hojjeettoonni saqqii hojiifi giirii irra deebiin fayyadamuu dura facaastuu yookaan haxooftuu manaan qulqulleessuufi baakteeriyaa irraa qulleessuu qabu, akkasumas PPE itti fayyadamame to’annaa jala galchuu fi gatuuf akkasumas uffatoota baachuufi miicuuf adeemsota hojii waaltawaa hordofuu qabu.
en-mt: If close contact occurs during a crisis, workers should clean and disinfect work surfaces and gear at home before reusing them, and follow common work procedures for handling and disposing of used PPE and carrying and washing clothes.

sourceString: OSHA considers certain healthcare and mortuary workers to be at high or very high categories of exposure risk.
targetString: OSHA’n hojjettoota kunuunsa fayyaafi mana reeffaa akaakuu balaa saxila ba’umsaa ol’aanaa yookaan baay’ee ol’aanaatti akka isaan ta’anitti fudhata.
en-mt: OSHA considers health care and mortuary workers to be at high or very high exposure risk.

sourceString: High exposure risk jobs include healthcare delivery, support, laboratory, and medical transport workers who are exposed to known or suspected COVID-19 patients.
targetString: Hojiin irra guddeessaan balaaf saaxilu kan akka kunuunsa-fayyaa kennuu, gargaarsa, laaboraatoorii fi geejjiba hojjettoota fayyaa kanneen dhukkubsattoota COVID-19 tti saaxilamuun isaanii beekame yookaan shakkame.
en-mt: Most at-risk activities such as health-care delivery, aid, laboratory and transportation of health workers are known or suspected exposure to COVID-19 patients.

sourceString: These become very high exposure risk if workers perform aerosol-generating procedures on, or collect or handle specimens from, known or suspected COVID-19 patients.
targetString: Kunniin yoo hojjettoonni adeemsota bulbula qilleensaa maddisiisuu hojjetan, yookaan sassaaban yookaan haala qabannaa eddattoowwanii dhukkubsattoota COVID-19’n qabaman yookaan shakkaman irraa funaanan balaaf saxilamuu baay’ee ol'aanaa ta’e.
en-mt: These are at very high risk if workers operate air bulb generation processes, or collect or handle samples from infected or suspected COVID-19 patients.

sourceString: Aerosol-generating procedures include intubation, cough induction procedures, bronchoscopies, some dental procedures and exams, or invasive specimen collection.
targetString: Adeemsoti bulbula qilleensa maddisiisuu qilleensa qoonqoon kennuu, adeemsota qufaa kakaasan, meeshaalee ittiin ujummoo qilleensaa sakattaa’an (bronchoscopies), adeemsota fi sakatta’insa ilkaanii muraasa, yookaan sassaabbii eddattoo muramee fuudhamu hammata.
en-mt: Ventilation bulb procedures include throat ventilation, cough-inducing procedures, bronchoscopies, some dental procedures and examinations, or the collection of a cut.

sourceString: High exposure risk mortuary jobs include workers involved in preparing the bodies of people who had known or suspected cases of COVID-19 at the time of their death; these become very high exposure risk if they perform an autopsy.Additional engineering controls for these risk groups include isolation rooms for patients with known or suspected COVID-19, including when aerosol-generating procedures are performed.
targetString: Hojiiwwan mana reeffaa balaa saaxila ba’uu ol’aanaa qaban kan hammatan hojjettoota qaamota namoota yeroo du’a isaaniitti COVID-19 qabaachuun isaanii mirkanaa’e yookaan dhimmoota shakkaman qaban qopheessuu keessatti hirmaatan; kunniin yoo isaan qorannoo reeffaa (autopsy) gaggeessu ta’e baay’ee balaa saaxila ba’uu ol’aanaa ta’a. To’annoowwan Injinariingii dabalataa gareewwan balaa kunniinii kan hammatu dhukkubsattoota kanneen COVID-19 qabaachuun isaanii beekamu yookaan shakkamaniif kutaawwan qofaatti baafamuu, yeroo adeemsonni bulbula qilleensaa maddisiisuu hojjetaman dabalatee.
en-mt: High-risk mortuary operations include employees involved in the preparation of bodies of people confirmed to have COVID-19 at the time of death or with suspected cases; these would be a much higher risk of exposure if they were to conduct an autopsy. Additional engineering controls for these risk groups include the evacuation of patients known or suspected of having COVID-19 to rooms only, including when air bubble generation processes are performed.

sourceString: Specialized negative pressure ventilation may be appropriate in some healthcare and mortuary settings.
targetString: Tarii dhiibbaan qilleensa alta’aa afarsuu adda ta'e kunuunsa fayyaa fi qindaa'ina kutaa reeffaa muraasaatti sirrii dha.
en-mt: Perhaps the unique effects of ventilation are appropriate for health care and a few mortuary settings.

sourceString: Specimens should be handled with Biosafety Level 3 precautions.
targetString: Eddattoowwan of-eeggannoowwan Biosafety sadarkaa 3 ffaa waliin qabamuu qabamu.
en-mt: Edges should be handled with Level 3 Biosafety precautions.

sourceString: The World Health Organization (WHO) recommends that incoming patients be separated into distinct waiting areas depending on whether they are a suspected COVID-19 case.In addition to other PPE, OSHA recommends respirators for those who work within 6 feet of patients known to be, or suspected of being, infected with SARS-CoV-2, and those performing aerosol-generating procedures.
targetString: Dhaabbanni Fayyaa Addunyaa (WHO) dhukkubsattoonni haaraan dhufan dhimma COVID-19’n shakkamuu isaanii irratti hundaa'uun bakka turtii addaatti gargar baafamanii turfamuu akka qaban yaada laata. PPE kan birootti dabalataan, OSHA’n warreen dhukkubsataa SARS-CoV-2' dhaan qabamuun isaa barame ykn shakkame cinaa hanga fageenya faana 6 keessatti hojjetanii fi warreen adeemsa bulbula qilleensa maddisiisuu raawwataniif meeshaawwan afaaniifi funyaanitti godhamanii qilleensa baasan akka fayyadaman yaada laata.
en-mt: The World Health Organization (WHO) recommends that newly arrived patients be kept in quarantine based on their suspected cases of COVID-1 In addition to other PPE, OSHA recommends the use of mouth and nose ventilators for those working within up to 6 feet of a patient who is known or suspected of being infected with SARS-CoV-2

sourceString: In the United States, NIOSH-approved N95 filtering facepiece respirators or better must be used in the context of a comprehensive, written respiratory protection program that includes fit-testing, training, and medical exams.
targetString: Yunaayitid Isteets keessatti, meeshaawwan afaaniifi funyaaanitti godhamanii qilleensa baasan (respirators) kan uffata fuulaa N95 NIOSH’n kan mirkanaa’e yookaan isaa ol ta’e galumsa hunda galeessa ta’e keessatti, sagantaa of-eeggannaa hargansuu barreeffame itti ta’uusaa qorachuu, leenjii fi sakatta’insa wal’aansaa hammatuun fayyadamamuu qaba.
en-mt: In the United States, oral and laryngeal respirators with N95 NIOSH-approved face clothing or higher in a comprehensive sentence, testing for labeled respiratory precautions, should be used in a manner that includes training and treatment checks.

sourceString: Other types of respirators can provide greater protection and improve worker comfort.The WHO does not recommend coveralls, as COVID-19 is a respiratory disease rather than being transmitted through bodily fluids.
targetString: Gosoonni meeshaawwan afaaniifi funyaaanitti godhamanii qilleensa baasan (respirators) eegumsa dinqii dhiyeessu akkasumas mijaa’ina hojjetaa dabalu. WHO’n uffata qaama guutuu haguugu (coveralls) hin eeru, COVID-19 dhibee dhangala’aa qaamaan daddarbu irra dhibee hargansuu waan ta’eef.
en-mt: Types of mouth and lip respirators offer miracle protection as well as increase worker comfort. The WHO does not mention coveralls, as COVID-19 is a respiratory disease rather than a body fluids.

sourceString: WHO recommends only a surgical mask for point-of-entry screening personnel.
targetString: WHO’n golgaa baqaqsanii hodhuu nama bakka galumsaa irraa calallii raawwatuuf eera.
en-mt: WHO refers to a surgical veil for the person performing the screening from the entrance.

sourceString: For those who are collecting respiratory specimens from, caring for, or transporting COVID-19 patients without any aerosol-generating procedures, WHO recommends a surgical mask, goggles, or face shield, gown, and gloves.
targetString: Kanneen eddattoowwan hargansuu namoota kunuunsa godhan, yookaan dhukkubsattoota COVID-19 adeemsota bulbula qilleensaa maddisiisuu malee waliin geejjiban irraa walitti qabaniif, golgaa baqaqsani yaaluu, WHO’n golgaawwan ijaa yookaan golgaa fuulaa, gaawonii, fi uffata harkaa eera.
en-mt: For those collecting respiratory samples from caregivers, or co-transporters of COVID-19 patients in processes other than generating air bubbles, WHO recommends surgical goggles, goggles or face shields, gowns, and gloves.

sourceString: If an aerosol-generating procedure is performed, the surgical mask is replaced with an N95 or FFP2 respirator.
targetString: Yoo adeemsoti bulbula qilleensa maddisiisuu hojjetaman, golgaan baqaqsanii hodhuu N95 yookaan meeshaa afaaniifi funyaaanitti godhamee qilleensa baasu FFP2 dhaan bakka bu’a.
en-mt: If bulb ventilation procedures are performed, the surgical veil is replaced by an N95 or an oral and lip ventilator with an FFP2

sourceString: Given that the global supply of PPE is insufficient, WHO recommends minimizing the need for PPE through telemedicine, physical barriers such as clear windows, allowing only those involved in direct care to enter a room with a COVID-19 patient, using only the PPE necessary for the specific task, continuing use of the same respirator without removing it while caring for multiple patients with the same diagnosis, monitoring and coordinating the PPE supply chain, and discouraging the use of masks for asymptomatic individuals.
targetString: Dhiyeessiin addunyaawaa PPE gahaa ta’uu dhabuun, WHO’n fedhii PPE karaa kunuunsa toora interneetii irraan dhukkubsattootaaf godhamuun (telemedicine), danqaawwan qaamaa kan akka foddaawwan ifoo ta’aniin, namoota kunuunsa kallattii keessatti hirmaaatan qofaa gara kutaa dhukkubsataa COVID-19 waliinii akka isaan seenan hayyamuun, PPE hojii murtaa’eef qofa fayyadu fayyadamuun, fayyadamiinsa meeshaa afaaniifi funyaaanitti godhamee qilleensa baasu (respirator) walfakkaataa yeroo dhukkubsattoota baay’ee qorannoo walfakkaataa waliiniif kunuunsi godhamutti ofirraa utuu hin baasin, cancala dhiyeessii PPE to’achuun fi qindeessuun akkasumas namoota mallattoo hin qabne akka isaan golga hin fayyadamne gochuun hir’isuu eera.
en-mt: Due to insufficient global supply of PPE, WHO has addressed the need for PPE through telemedicine, with physical barriers such as transparent windows, allowing only people involved in direct care to share a COVID-19 patient unit allowing entry, using PPE for a specific purpose only, without withdrawing the use of the same respirator when caring for multiple patients for the same test, controlling and coordinating the supply chain of PPE and people without symptoms mentions reducing the amount we have by making them not use shade.

sourceString: FROM: Katherine Maher, Wikimedia Foundation CEO
targetString: Katherine Maher, CEO Dhaabbata Wikimedia irraa
en-mt: From Katherine Maher, CEO of the Wikimedia Foundation

sourceString: TO: All Wikimedia Foundation staff
targetString: GARA: Hojjeettoota Dhaabbata Wikimedia Hundaaf
en-mt: TO: All Wikimedia Foundation Employees

sourceString: SUBJECT LINE: [Covid-19] Lightening the load and preparing for the future
targetString: MATA-DUREE DHIMMAA: [Covid-19] Ba’icha salphisuu fi hegereef qophaa’uu.
en-mt: TOPIC: [Covid-19] Easing the burden and preparing for the future.

sourceString: SEND DATE/TIME: 14 March, 2020, 00:24 UTC
targetString: ERGI GUYYAA/SA’AATII: Bitootessa 14, 2020, 00:24 UTC
en-mt: SEND DATE/TIME: February 14, 2020, 00:24 UTC

sourceString: LICENSING: CC0: No rights reserved
targetString: HAYYAMUU: CC0: Mirgi KAMIYYUU eegamaa miti.
en-mt: ALLOW: CC0: ANY rights are not reserved.

sourceString: We find ourselves in remarkable circumstances this month.
targetString: Ji’a kana nuyi ofii keenya haala ajaa’ibsiisaa keessatti argine.
en-mt: This month we found ourselves in a surprising position.

sourceString: The COVID-19 epidemic is something that makes clear our global human interconnectedness and the responsibilities we have to one another.
targetString: Dhukkubni battalatti iddoo hunda ga’u COVID-19 wanta walitti dhufeenya namummaa addunyaawaa keenyaa fi itti gaafatamummaa nuti walii keenyaaf qabnu ifa godhudha.
en-mt: The instantly ubiquitous disease COVID-19 is something that highlights our global human relationship and our responsibility to each other.

sourceString: We don’t have precedent for its challenges, but we do know that our best response relies on the sort of global empathy, cooperation, and community building that sits at the heart of this organization.
targetString: Nuyi morkii isaaf murtii duraan murta’ee akka fakkeenyaatti fudhatamu hin qabnu, garuu deebiin keenya inni cufa irra dansaa ta’e miira addunyaa hubachuu, walta’iinsa, akkasumas ijaarsa hawaasaa kan iddoo onnee dhaabbata kanaa taa’u irratti hundaa’a.
en-mt: We do not have a predetermined decision to take as an example for his opposition, but our best response is based on a sense of global understanding, cooperation, and community building that sits at the heart of this organization.

sourceString: The camaraderie and care we have seen among all of our colleagues over email, calls, and chats is a remarkable validation of the incredible humans we are fortunate enough to work with.
targetString: Miirri amanamummaafi kunuunsa waa'illan hojii keenya gidduutti kan imeelii, waamicha bilbilaa, fi qaaqa (haasaa) irratti argine dhala namaa dinqisisoo nuti waliin hojjechuuf carroomne ta'uu isaanii kan haala dinqisiisaadhaan mirkaneessudha.
en-mt: The sense of loyalty and care among our colleagues that we saw in emails, phone calls, and conversations is a remarkable testament to the wonderful human beings we have been fortunate enough to work with.

sourceString: I couldn’t be more grateful and proud to count you all as colleagues.
targetString: Ani hunda keessan akka hiriyaatti lakkaa’uun kana caalaa galateeffachuufi boonuu hin danda’u.
en-mt: I could not be more grateful and proud to count you all as friends.

sourceString: Last week, someone shared with me their appreciation for our work.
targetString: Torbee darbe, namoonni ta’an dinqisiifannaa hojii keenyaaf qaban naaf qoodan.
en-mt: Last week, people shared with me their appreciation for our work.

sourceString: They reminded me how meaningful it is for the world to be able to turn to Wikipedia right now, and what a powerful symbol it is for this critical resource to remain online and available to all.
targetString: Isaan amma addunyaaf gara Wikipedia tti deebi’uun hammam hiika qabeessa akka ta’e na yaadachiisan, akkasumas mallattoo humna qabeessa akkamiiti qabeenya murteessaa kanaaf sarara irraafi hundumaaf kan argamu ta’uun.
en-mt: They reminded me how meaningful it now is for the world to return to Wikipedia, and what a powerful sign it is for this critical resource to be available offline and to all.

sourceString: Your work makes this possible, whether you keep the sites stay up or our colleagues paid or our communities safe.
targetString: Hojiin kee wanti kun akka milkaa'u godha, iddoowwan hojii akka hojiirra turan yoo goote, yookaaan hiriyoota keenyaaf kaffaltii yoo itti fufte yookaan hawaasa keenya nagaa yoo goote.
en-mt: Your work makes this thing work, whether you keep the positions functioning, or keep paying our friends or keep our communities safe.

sourceString: The world needs the information that Wikipedia provides, now more than ever.
targetString: Addunyaan odeeffannoo Wikipedia’n dhiyeessu barbaaddi, yeroo kamiyyuu caalaa amma.
en-mt: The world needs the information Wikipedia provides, now more than ever.

sourceString: This is a moment in which not only what we do, but how we do it, will make a meaningful impact on the world.
targetString: Yeroon kun maal akka hojjennu qofaa miti, garuu akkamitti akka hojjennutu, dhiibbaa hiika qabu addunyaa irratti fida.
en-mt: This is a time when it’s not just about what we do, but how we do it, that makes a meaningful impact on the world.

sourceString: Because of the importance of this mission and your role in it, we will be making some significant adjustments to how we work together, starting this coming week.
targetString: Sababa barbaachisummaa ergama kanaafi gahee ati achi keessaa qabduun, torbee dhufu kana irraa jalqabnee, haala waliin hojjennu irratti sirreeffamoota barbaachisoo murtaa'oo ni goona.
en-mt: Because of the importance of this mission and your role in it, starting this coming week, we will make certain important adjustments to the way we work together.

sourceString: Adjustments to our work and schedules
targetString: Sirreeffama hojii keenyaa fi sagantaa keenya irratti godhame.
en-mt: Adjustments to our work and schedule.

sourceString: As Robyn mentioned previously, the c-team met last night to discuss our approach and schedule for the coming days and months.
targetString: Kanaan dura akka Robyn eeretti, gareen-c waa'ee akkaataa raawwiifi sagantaa keenya guyyootaafi ji'oota dhufanii mari'achuuf kaleessa galgala walga'anii turan.
en-mt: Earlier, as Robyn mentioned, team-c had met last night to discuss how to perform and our schedule for the coming days and months.

sourceString: In that conversation, we considered what we thought would be an appropriate response to what we’re facing and the best way to keep the organization sustainable during this time.
targetString: Haasaa sana keessatti, wanta nu mudataa jiruuf deebii madalawaa fi yeroo kana keessatti dhaabbatichi itti fufiinsa akka qabaatu gochuuf karaa gaarii ta'a jennee yaadne tilmaama keessa galchineerra.
en-mt: In that conversation, we took into account what we thought would be a reasonable response to what we were facing and the best way to keep the company sustainable during this time.

sourceString: Overwhelmingly we wanted to remove stress and support our mission for the long term.
targetString: Hamma guddaan nuyi dhiphina balleessuu fi ergama keenya yeroo dheeraa deeggaruu barbaanne.
en-mt: To a great extent we wanted to relieve stress and support our long-term mission.

sourceString: If you need to dial back, that’s okay.
targetString: Yoo deebitanii bilbiluu barbaaddan, rakkoo hin qabu.
en-mt: If you want to call back, no problem.

sourceString: For all staff, contractors, and contract workers:
targetString: Hojjettoota hundumaaf, kontiraaktarootaaf, fi hojjettoota kontiraataaf:
en-mt: To all employees, contractors, and contract workers:

sourceString: our daily working expectations will be about 4 hours a day, or 20 hours a week until further notice.
targetString: abdiin keenya guyyaa guyyaa kan hojii guyyaatti sa'aatiiwwan 4, yookaan hanga yaadannoo dabalataatti torbanitti sa'aatiiwwan 20 ta’a.
en-mt: our daily expectation of work is 4 hours per day, or 20 hours per week until further notice.

sourceString: We’re not declaring a holiday - if you are able to work more normal hours, the mission can use you.
targetString: Nuyi ayyaana labsaa hin jirru – yoo isin sa’aatiiwwan idilee dabalataa hojjechuu dandeessu ta’e, ergamichi isiniin fayyadamuu danda’a.
en-mt: We're not declaring a holiday – if you guys can work extra regular hours, the mission can use you.

sourceString: However, the world is unpredictable right now, and whether you need to care for loved ones, get groceries, or go to the doctor, your well-being is our priority.
targetString: Ta’us, addunyichi yeroo ammaa raagamaa miti, akkasumas yoo namoota jaallattaniif kunuunsa gochuu barbaaddanis ta’e, mi’oota argachuu yookaan doktara bira deemuu barbaaddanis, fayyummaan keessan wanta nuti dursa kenninuufidha.
en-mt: Yet, the world is not predictable right now, and whether you want to care for your loved ones, get groceries or go to the doctor, your well-being is our top priority.

sourceString: We are not tracking your time.
targetString: Nuyi yeroo keessan faana dhahaa hin jirru.
en-mt: We are not beating your time.

sourceString: If you are sick, do not work.
targetString: Yoo isin dhukkubaa jira ta’e, hin hojjetinaa.
en-mt: If you're sick, don't do it.

sourceString: This should go without saying, but we’re saying it.
targetString: Kuni utuu hin jedhin deemuu qaba, garuu nuyi isa jechaa jirra.
en-mt: This should go without saying, but we are saying it.

sourceString: No sick days or PTO required - just tell your manager and help your team revise calendars and schedules to make sure key areas of work are covered.
targetString: Guyyooti dhukkubaa yookaan PTO’n hin barbaadamani -hoogganaa keessanitti himaa akkasumas gareen keessan akka kaaleendarootaafi iddoowwan hojii ijoon haguugamuu isaanii mirkaneessuuf sagantaawwan akka irra deebi’an gargaaraa.
en-mt: No sick days or PTO are required -tell your manager and help your team revise schedules to ensure calendars and key positions are covered.

sourceString: (If you are diagnosed positive for COVID-19, please let Bryan within T&C Ops know so T&C can help with support and make sure your situation gets appropriate attention from management).
targetString: (Yoo COVID-19 qabaachuun keessan beekame, adaraa Bryan inni T&C Ops keessaa akka beeku godhaa T&C’n gargaarsa akka kennuufi haalli keessan bulchiinsa irraa xiyyeeffannaa barbaachisu akka argatu mirkaneessuuf).
en-mt: (If you are diagnosed with COVID-19, please let Bryan in T&C Ops know so that T&C can provide assistance and ensure that your situation receives the attention it needs from the administration).

sourceString: Hourly folks will be fully paid.
targetString: Hojjettoonni sa’atiidhaan hojjetan kaffaltii guutuu argatu.
en-mt: Hourly employees are paid in full.

sourceString: We have already said, and are recommitting to honor our commitments to our contractors and hourly staff colleagues.
targetString: Kanaan duras jennee jirra, akkasumas kutannoo kontiraaktarootaafi waa'ellan yeroo hojii guyyaa keenyaaf qabnu leellisuudhaaf ammas irra deebinee of-kennaa jirra.
en-mt: We have said it before, and we are committing ourselves again to advocating for the commitment of contractors and employees to our day's work.

sourceString: Everyone will be paid on the basis of their usual hours worked during normal circumstances.
targetString: Tokkoon tokkoon hojjettootaatiif sa’atii yeroo biyyi nagaa hojjetaa turan irratti hundaa’uudhaan kaffaltiin raawwatamaaf.
en-mt: Each employee is paid based on the hours they worked during peacetime.

sourceString: This includes if you are sick and unable to work.
targetString: Kun kan hammatu yoo isin dhukkubeefi hojjechuu hin dandeessan ta’edha.
en-mt: This includes if you are sick and unable to work.

sourceString: If you want to work, we support you.
targetString: Yoo hojjechuu ni barbaaddu ta’e, nuyi isin deeggarra.
en-mt: If you want to work, we support you.

sourceString: Many people use work as a way of channeling their stress with the world around us.
targetString: Namoonni baay’een hojii addunyaa nu marsee jiru waliin karaa ittiin dhiphina isaanii dabarfataniitti fayyadamu.
en-mt: Many people use work as a way to pass on their stress with the world around us.

sourceString: What we do can be incredibly rewarding, especially during times like this.
targetString: Waanti nuti hojjennu akka ajaa'ibaatti kan badhaasisu dha, Keessumattuu yeroo akkasiitti.
en-mt: What we do is wonderfully rewarding, Especially at times like this.

sourceString: Again, this is about your self-care.
targetString: Ammas, kun waa’ee kunuunsa dhuunfaa keessaniiti.
en-mt: Again, this is about your personal care.

sourceString: Our ask is that you communicate with your manager, so we know what to expect and can adjust accordingly.
targetString: Gaaffiin keenya akka isin hoogganaa keessan waliin walqunnamtani, kanaaf maal akka eegamuu qabu barra akkasumas haala sanaan mijeessuu dandeenya.
en-mt: Our request is that you communicate with your manager, so we learn what to expect and can tailor accordingly.

sourceString: Some work is considered essential.
targetString: Hojii muraasni barbaachisaa ta’ee ilaalama.
en-mt: Few jobs are considered necessary.

sourceString: There are some things that we must keep doing.
targetString: Waantota muraasa nuyi hojjechuu itti fufuu qabnutu jiru.
en-mt: There are a few things we need to keep doing.

sourceString: The SRE, HR Ops, Trust & Safety, and Fundraising teams (among others) do critical work that may need additional support.
targetString: SRE, HR Ops, Trust & Safety, akkasumas gareewwan gargaarsa walitti qaban (kan biro keessaa) hojiiwwan murteessoo kan deeggarsa dabalataa barbaaduu malan hojjetu.
en-mt: SRE, HR Ops, Trust & Safety, as well as grantmaking teams (among others) handle critical functions that may require additional support.

sourceString: We’ll begin a process with all departments to assess current objectives and shift our focus to supporting what’s essential for our mission.
targetString: Dippaartimantoota hunda waliin kaayyoowwan yeroo ammaa qorachuuf adeemsa ni jalqabna akkasumas xiyyeeffannaa keenya gara waan ergama keenyaaf barbaachisaa ta’e deeggaruutti naanneffanna.
en-mt: We will begin the process of examining current objectives with all departments and turn our attention to supporting what is important to our mission.

sourceString: There’s plenty to do for all of us, we just will all focus on the most essential projects.
targetString: Hunda keenyaafuu waanti hojjannu baay'eetu jira, pirojeektoota baay'ee barbaachisaa ta'an irratti xiyyeeffanna.
en-mt: There is so much for all of us to do, we focus on the most important projects.

sourceString: Slowing now won’t hurt later.
targetString: Amma suuta jechuun booda kan miidhu hin ta’u.
en-mt: Slowing down now won't hurt later.

sourceString: We do not plan to go “double-time to catch up” once the pandemic has passed.
targetString: Weerarichi takkaa erga darbee booda nuyi “bira ga’uuf yeroo dachaa” hin karoorsinu
en-mt: Once the attack has passed, we do not plan “multiple times to reach it.”

sourceString: You will not be expected to work extra hours to meet deadlines which are now unrealistic.
targetString: Isin guyyaa hojiin itti xumuramutti hojii gashuuf sa’aatiiwwan dabalataa hojjechuun isin irraa hin eegamu kan amma dhugaa irraa fagaate,
en-mt: You are not expected to work overtime to get to work on the deadline which is now far from the truth,

sourceString: We accept that circumstances have changed, and will work to set new targets and timelines where appropriate.
targetString: Haalonni jijjiiramuun isaanii nuu gala, bakka barbaachisaa ta’etti immoo galma haaraa dhiyeeffachuu fi sagantaa haarawa baafachuuf ni hojjenna.
en-mt: We understand that circumstances have changed and, where necessary, we will work to set new goals and programs.

sourceString: What happens with the APP (Annual Planning)?
targetString: APP (Karoora Waggaa) waliin maaltu ta’a?
en-mt: What happens with the APP (Annual Plan)?

sourceString: To adjust to our new reality and daily working hour expectations, we intend to adjust the timeline for the delivery of our 2020-2021 Annual Plan.
targetString: Dhugaa keenya haaraafi tilmaama sa’aatii hojii keenyaa mijeessuuf, Karoora Waggaa 2020-2021 keenya gashuuf yeroo isaa mijeessuu yaadneerra.
en-mt: To accommodate our new facts and our working hours estimates, we have decided to schedule our 2020-2021 Annual Plan.

sourceString: Our intention is to propose an extension of our 2019-2020 plan that allows more time for budgeting to allow employees to prioritize critical work, self-care, and care for loved ones while accommodating those who need or wish to work a reduced schedule over the next few weeks.
targetString: Yaadni keenya karoora 2019-2020 keenya dheeressuu karoorsuudha kan hojjettoota yeroo dabalataa baajataaf hojii murteessaatiif, kunuunsa dhuunfaaf, akkasumas kunuunsa namoota jaallataniif dursa akka kennan gargaaru yeroo warreen sagantaa hir’ifame hojjechuu barbaadan yookaan hawwan torban xiqqoo dhufanitti walittiqabaman.
en-mt: Our intention is to plan an extension of our 2019-2020 plan that will help staff budget overtime to prioritize critical work, personal care, and the care of loved ones as those who want or desire to work a reduced schedule gather in the next few weeks.

sourceString: This timeline extension greatly reduces current planning workloads and pressure across the whole organization.
targetString: Dheerinni yeroo kun baay’ina hojii yeroo ammaa karoorfameefi dhiibbaa guutummaa dhaabbaticha keessaa caalmaan hir’isa.
en-mt: This extension greatly reduces the amount of work currently planned and the impact across the organization.

sourceString: We will introduce our proposal to the Board next week and will update delegates and teams on the next steps as soon as we have confirmation.
targetString: Abuurroo keenya torbee dhufu Boordiif ni ibsina akkasumas akkuma mirkaneessa arganneen tarkaanfiiwwan itti aanan bakka bu’ooataafi gareewwan ni beeksifna.
en-mt: We will explain our position to the Board next week and will inform the representatives and teams of the next steps as soon as we receive confirmation.

sourceString: Thank you to the APP team for your leadership in this.
targetString: Gareen APP hooggansa keessan as keessaatiif galatoomaa.
en-mt: Thank you APP team for your leadership here.

sourceString: Office status, exposure, and cleaning
targetString: Haala waajjiraa, saaxila ba’uu, fi qulqulleessuu
en-mt: Office settings, exposure, and cleaning

sourceString: Last week, we learned that one of our SF-based colleagues may have been exposed to the COVID-19 virus.
targetString: Torban darbe, namnoota wajjin hojjennu keessaa tokko, kan SF-keessa jiraatu, vaayirasii COVID-19 tiif saaxilamuu isaa akka hin oolle barre.
en-mt: Last week, we learned that one of our co-workers, who lives in SF, was likely exposed to the COVID-19 virus.

sourceString: However, out of an abundance of caution, we employed an antiviral cleaning crew to disinfect all surfaces in the San Francisco office.
targetString: Haa ta’u malee, eeggannoo baay’ee guddaa gochuu waan barbaanneef, waajjira Saan Firaansiskoo keessaa hunda isaa bilisa taasisuuf hojjettoota farra vaayirasii qacaranne.
en-mt: However, we wanted to take a much greater precaution, so we hired antivirus staff to keep it all free from the San Francisco office.

sourceString: They utilized a hospital-grade anti-viral solution to disinfect every surface, as well as the lobby and elevator banks accessing our floor.
targetString: Isaan bulbula farra dhukkuba vaayirasiin dhufuu sadarkaa hospitaalaa dirra hunda, akkasumas bakka bal’aa gamoo keessaa (lobby) fi qarqara meggoo darbii keenyatti fidan qulqulleessuuf fayyadamani.
en-mt: They used the disinfectant solutions they brought to the hospital level to clean all the fields, as well as the lobby and the edge of our stairs.

sourceString: The building is employing its own duty-of-care protocol utilizing products that support the safety of their tenants.
targetString: Ijaarsichi oomishoota nageenya kireeffatoota isaanii kan deeggaran fayyadamu qajeelfama kunuunsa dirqamaa mataa isaa fayyadama jira.
en-mt: The builder uses products that support the safety of their tenants is using its own mandatory maintenance guidelines.

sourceString: We feel comfortable that the office will be well-prepared for when we decide to return.
targetString: Gaafa deebi’uuf murteeffannu waajjirichi sirriitti qophaa’ee akka nu eegu qananiitu nutti dhagahama.
en-mt: We feel lucky that the office is well prepared and waiting for us when we decide to return.

sourceString: Our DC office is located in a WeWork, which has shared its COVID-19 protocol with us and all DC-based staff members.
targetString: Biiroon DC keenya WeWork keessatti argama, kan qajeelfama COVID-19 isaa nuyiifi miseensota hojjettoota DC keessa ta'anii hunda waliin qooddate.
en-mt: Our DC office is located in WeWork, which shared its COVID-19 guidelines with us and all staff members in DC.

sourceString: As of last week, our DC office moved to a fully remote setup in line with the guidance shared with San Francisco.
targetString: Torbee dhumaa irraa ka’ee, Waajjirri DC keenya qajeelfama Saan Firaansiskoo waliin qoodameen guutummaatti qindaa’ina fagootti jijjiirameera.
en-mt: As of the weekend, our DC Office has been fully converted to remote settings with instructions shared with San Francisco.

sourceString: As some of our NYC-based colleagues know, we have also been in discussion about leasing a location in Brooklyn.
targetString: Akkuma waa'illan hojii keenya muraasni NYC jiraatan beekan, bakka Brooklyn keessatti argamu kireessuuf marii irra turre.
en-mt: As a few of our colleagues in NYC know, we were in negotiations to lease a location in Brooklyn.

sourceString: These discussions are continuing but may be delayed.
targetString: Mareewwan kunniin itti fufaa jiru garuu tursiifamuu malu.
en-mt: These discussions are ongoing but may be delayed.

sourceString: Some of our colleagues are working remotely for the first time.
targetString: Namoonni waliin hojjennu tokko tokko yeroo jalqabaatiif fageenyarra taa’anii hojjetaa jiru.
en-mt: Some of our colleagues are working remotely for the first time.

sourceString: Our long-time remote colleagues know that it can be an adjustment, and wanted to offer you some advice:
targetString: Namoonni waggoota dheeraadhaaf fageenyarraa nu waliin hojjetan sirreeffama ta’uu akka danda’u beeku, isiniif immoo gorsa muraasa kennuu barbaadu.
en-mt: People who have worked with us remotely for many years know it can be an adjustment, and they want to give you a few tips.

sourceString: Limit the length of meetings to at most one or two hour increments.
targetString: Dheerina yeroo walga’ii yoo baay’ate daballii sa’aatii tokkoo yookaan lamaatti daangessaa.
en-mt: Limit session length to a maximum of one or two hour increments.

sourceString: If longer sessions are required, consider how they can be broken up over the course of several days.
targetString: Yoo marii dheeraa barbaachisa ta’e, guyyoota hedduutti akkamittiin caccabsuun akka danda’amu yaadaa.
en-mt: If it requires a longer discussion, think about how it can be broken down into several days.

sourceString: Clearly define the meeting, have an agenda, and send reading materials in advance.
targetString: Walga’icha sirriitti ibsaa, ajandaa qabaadhaa, akkasumas meeshaawwan dubbisaa dursaatii ergaa.
en-mt: Describe the meeting clearly, have an agenda, and send reading materials in advance.

sourceString: Make video the default, with tools like Google Docs and Zoom to facilitate live collaboration and connection.
targetString: Suursagalee, waltumsuufi qunnamtii kallattii mijeessuuf meeshaalee akka Google Docs fi Zoom waliin durtii godhaa.
en-mt: Default with tools like Google Docs and Zoom to facilitate voice, collaboration and direct communication.

sourceString: Have a lead to facilitate every meeting, someone to monitor the chat for questions and track the speaker list, and someone to help take notes (or do collaborative note-taking).
targetString: Walga'ii hunda mijeessuuf gaggeessaa, nama gaaffiiwwaniif haasicha to’atuufi tarreeffama dubbataa faana dhahu, akkasumas nama yaadannoo qabuun gargaaru (yookaan yaadannoo gamtoominaan qabachuu hojjetu) qabaadhaa.
en-mt: Have a conductor to facilitate all meetings, someone to moderate the talk for questions and accompany the speaker list, and someone to help with notes (or do collective notes).

sourceString: Send an email to tech support if you need a comfortable headset.
targetString: Yoo heedseetii mijataa barbaaddu ta’e imeelii tech support tti ergaa.
en-mt: Email tech support if you are looking for a comfortable headset.

sourceString: Use your wellness reimbursement for snacks.
targetString: Kaffaltii fayyummaa keessaniif deebi’ee isiinif kaffalame sharfaaf fayyadamaa.
en-mt: Use your refund for your health payments for exchange.

sourceString: Join the #remoties channel in Slack to talk with your colleagues about distributed work
targetString: Waa'ee hojii raabsamee waa'iloota kee wajjin haasa'uuf #remoties channel kan Slack keessaatti makami
en-mt: Join the #remoties channel in Slack to talk to your colleagues about distributed work

sourceString: The HR Operations team is looking into webinar-based ergonomics guidance to support the increase in distributed work across the Foundation.
targetString: Gareen humna namaa (HR) hojii irratti bobba’an Dhaabbaticha keessatti dabalamuu hojiiwwan raabsamanii gargaaruuf qajeelfama irgoonomiksii leenjii sarara irraa irratti hundaa’e xiinxalaa jiru.
en-mt: Operational human resources (HR) teams are analyzing offline training based ergonomics guidelines to assist with the addition of distributed operations in the Company.

sourceString: This past week we asked all community grant recipients to cancel Wikimedia-funded public events, such as editathons, until the WHO declares the pandemic to be over.
targetString: Torbee darbe kana fudhattoota kennaa hawaasaa hunda taateewwan uummataa Wiikiimiidiyaan gargaarsa argatan, kanneen akka editathons, hamma WHO’n weerarichi dhaabachuusaa labsutti akka haqan gaafanne.
en-mt: This past week we asked all community gift recipients to cancel Wikimedia-sponsored public events, such as editathons, until the WHO declares a halt to the outbreak.

sourceString: We let them know that we understood that our request for cancellations and other restrictions could make it impossible to complete their agreed-upon grant activities and that no one would be penalized for having to delay or modify those goals.
targetString: Gaaffiin keenya kan haquufi daangeffamoota kan biroo gochaawwan isaanii kennaa irratti waliigalame xumuruuf akka hin danda’amne akka godhu kan hubanne ta’uu akkasumas eenyuyyuu maniiwwan sanneen yoo tursiise yookaan fooyyesse kan hin adabamne ta’uu isaan beeksifna.
en-mt: We understand that our request for cancellation and other restrictions will make it impossible for their actions to complete the agreed gift and that anyone who delays or improves the houses will not be punished.

sourceString: This coming week we will follow up with additional guidance on Wikimania and other regional and thematic community conferences.
targetString: Torbee dhufaa jiru kana qajeelcha dabalataa Wikimaniiyaa fi yaa'iiwwan biroo naannoofi hawaasaa dhaamsa irratti hundaa’e irra jiru waliin hordofna.
en-mt: We'll follow up next week with more guidance on Wikimania and other local and community message-based conferences.

sourceString: The general sentiment from around the global community seems to be both sadness at the disruption but relief at the clarity and ability to focus on their own communities, Wikimedia and otherwise.
targetString: Miirri waliigalaa hawaasa addunyaa irraa lamaanuu jeequmsatti gadda fakkaata garuu iftoomatti boqonnaa akkasumas dandeettii hawaasota isaanii, Wikimiidiyaa fi kanaan alaa irratti xiyyeeffachuu.
en-mt: The general sentiment from the global community seems to be both sadness at the violence but frankly relief as well as a focus on the potential of their communities, Wikimedia and beyond.

sourceString: Going forward, the CRT is working to set up a page on Meta-Wiki to provide a space for the community to monitor the impact and follow our communications with them.
targetString: Gara duraatti deemuun, CRT‘n hawaasi dhiibbaa sana akka to’atuuf bakka dhiyeessuufi isaan waliin qunnamtii keenya akka hordofnuuf Meta-Wiki irratti fuula qindeessuuf hojjetaa jira.
en-mt: Going forward, the CRT is working to compile a page on the Meta-Wiki to offer a place for the community to control that impact and keep track of our communications with them.

sourceString: Staying in touch around COVID-19 related issues
targetString: Naannoo dhimmoota COVID-19 waliin walqabatanii turuu.
en-mt: Stay around COVID-19 issues.

sourceString: We’ll be sending an invitation to your calendars for next Thursday, 14:00 UTC/07:00 PT for a special staff meeting.
targetString: Kamisa dhufu 14:00UTC/07:00PT tti waltajjii hojjettootaa addaatiif gara sagantaa keessaniitti afeerraa ergaa jirra.
en-mt: We are sending an invite to your event next Thursday at 14:00UTC/07:00PT for a special staff workshop.

sourceString: We’ll use this time to share additional updates, answer your questions and spend some time connecting with each other.
targetString: Yeroo kana dabalataan waantota haarawoo qooddachuu, gaaffilee keessan deebisuu fi waliitti dhufnee yeroo muraasa waliin dabarsuuf itti fayyadamna.
en-mt: We will also use this time to share updates, answer your questions and get together and spend some time together.

sourceString: We’re in this together and here to help however we can.
targetString: Nuyi kana keessa walumaan jirra akkasumas hamma dandeenyeen gargaaruuf as jirra.
en-mt: We’re in this together and we’re here to help however we can.

sourceString: In the meantime, you can continue to find the information from this email, and all other essential COVID-19 related information, on Office Wiki.
targetString: Hangasitti, imeelii kanarraa odeeffannoo, akkasumas odeeffannoo biroo kan COVID-19 waliin walqabatan isaan barbaachisoo, Office Wiki irraa barbaaduu itti fuufuu dandeessu.
en-mt: In the meantime, you can continue to search for information from this email, as well as other important COVID-19-related information, from the Office Wiki.

sourceString: The CRT will keep these pages updated and all the information in one place.
targetString: CRT’n fuulota kanaafi odeeffannoo hunda ammayyoomsuun bakka tokko isaan kaa’a.
en-mt: The CRT updates these pages and all the information and puts them in one place.

sourceString: We are also working to maintain regular communications with staff who reside in countries that are currently significantly affected.
targetString: Hojjettoota biyyoota baay’ee miidhaman keessa jiraatan waliin quunnamtii dhaabbataan akka jiraatuufis hojjechaa jirra.
en-mt: We are also working to maintain constant contact with workers in the most affected countries.

sourceString: If you have any questions about travel, events, a major workstream, or coverage challenge, or anything else you may need help with, please don’t hesitate to notify and work with the CRT.
targetString: Waa’ee imalaa, taateewwanii, bakkee hojii bal’aa, yookaan danqaa uwwisaa, yookaan wanta deeggarsa itti barbaaddan kan biraa kamiinuu ilaalchistanii gaaffii kamiinuu yoo qabaattan CRT beeksisuufi waliin hojjechuuf duubatti hin deebi’inaa maaloo.
en-mt: Please do not hesitate to let CRT know and work with you if you have any questions about travel, events, extensive work locations, or coverage constraints, or anything else you need support for.

sourceString: We’re here to help provide support and liaise as needed.
targetString: Nuti as kan jirruuf deeggarsi akka dhiyaatu gochuu fi akka barbaachisummaa isaatti warra kaan waliin gamtaan hojjechuufidha.
en-mt: We are here to make support available and work in solidarity with others as needed.

sourceString: If you have a confidential or sensitive matter, please email Bryan Judan - Director of HR International Global Operations.
targetString: Yoo waan iccitaawaa yookaan miira-qabeessa qabaattan, adaraa Bryan Judan - Daarakteera Opereeshinii Addunyaawaa Humna Namaa (Director of HR International Global Operations) tiif imeelii barreessaa
en-mt: If you have anything confidential or sensitive, please email Bryan Judan - Director of HR International Global Operations

sourceString: None of these changes should be seen as an abandonment of our work and obligations.
